lead_paragraph: As many as 24,000 Poles, dressed in black, took to the streets in Warsaw to protest the proposed legislation. “Let them have their fun,” the foreign minister said.

headline.print_headline: Protesters in Poland Rally Against a Proposal to Criminalize All Abortions
headline.main: Protesters in Poland Rally Against Proposal for Total Abortion Ban

snippet: As many as 24,000 Poles, dressed in black, took to the streets in Warsaw to protest the proposed legislation. “Let them have their fun,” the foreign minister said....
abstract: Over 24,000 demonstrators gather in Warsaw to protest proposed legislation that would criminalize all abortions in Poland.
